title: Maybe Romance
alternative_title: Maybe Romance ; 어쩌면 로맨스 ; 어쩌면 로맨스! ; 어쩌면 로맨틱
status: Maybe Romance ; 어쩌면 로맨스 ; 어쩌면 로맨스! ; 어쩌면 로맨틱
description:
Description :
        Matthew is a bodyguard who is raising his daughter as a single father after divorcing his husband. Unable to resist his daughter's request, Matthew ends up working at a cruise party where the artist, Eden, is featured. Even though Eden looked like Matthew's first love, Matthew was drawn in by Eden's sparkle and allure, and they spend their night together. Despite thinking it would end there, they connect once more on land. Eden sees traces in his passed away sister in Matthew, and wants to protect him by his side...+
